titleStmt.title: Oratio funebris habita in templo beatæ Mariæ Oxon. Ab Isaaco Wake, Publico academiæ oratore, Maij 25. An. 1607. quum mœsti Oxonienses, pijs manibus Iohannis Rainoldi parentarent
titleStmt.author: Wake, Isaac, Sir, 1580?-1632.

notesStmt.note: Originally published in 1607 as part of his: Rex Platonicus.
Leaves cropped at foot, with some loss of signatures.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
